mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 != sorted_s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)

    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2
